# The `VariadicOperandTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/variadicoperandtraits">VariadicOperandTraits</a> - determine the allocation regime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> array when it is a prefix to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object, and the number of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> objects is only known at allocation time. <a href="#details">More...</a>

struct llvm::VariadicOperandTraits&lt;SubClass&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/variadicoperandtraits">VariadicOperandTraits</a> - determine the allocation regime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> array when it is a prefix to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> object, and the number of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> objects is only known at allocation time.
